abstract: Alibaba Group, the Chinese e-commerce firm, has announced the acquisition of Auctiva, a California tech company which develops tools for eBay retailers, The Silicon Valley Mercury News reported.
snippet: Alibaba Group, the Chinese e-commerce firm, has announced the acquisition of Auctiva, a California tech company which develops tools for eBay retailers, The Silicon Valley Mercury News reported.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese e-commerce firm Alibaba Group has announced the acquisition of Auctiva, a California tech company which develops tools for eBay retailers, The Silicon Valley Mercury News reported.

headline.main: Alibaba Acquires Auctiva, a California Tech Firm
